item.title: Using Mutex<T> to synchronize access to a shared resource
item.description: When you need to access a shared resource, you can use the lock statement or a synchronization primitive such as a Mutex to synchronize access to the resource. item.title: Waiting for a ManualResetEventSlim to be set asynchronously
